11</SPAN>】甲企业向客户出售汽车时以低于现行市场利率的利率向客户提供融资作为营销激励。由于甲企业提供的利率低于市场利率，该金融资产的初始入账价值将是合同面值的折价。根据合 
同约定，客户有权在合同到期前的任一时点以合同面值提前偿还该债务。对于客户来说该融资具有优势（利率低于市场利率），不太可能会选择提前偿付，导致该金融资产提前偿付特征的公允 
价值非常小。在此情况下，该金融资产符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>

</SPAN><SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具。</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> <SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">在一些交易中，发行人可利用多个合同挂钩工具来安排向金融资产持有人付款的优先劣后顺序（分级）。对于某一分级的金融资产持有人来说，仅当发行人取得足够的现金流量以满足更优</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">先级的支付时，此类工具的持有人才有权取得对本金和未偿付本金的利息的偿付。当同时符合下</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">列条件时，企业持有的某一分级的金融资产才符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>1</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）分级的合同条款（在未穿透基础资产的情况下），产生的现金流量仅为对本金和以未偿</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">付本金金额为基础的利息的支付（例如该分级的利率未与商品价格指数挂钩）。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>2</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）基础资产包含一个或多个符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征的工具（以下称基础工</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">具）。这里的基础资产，是指穿透到最底层的、源生现金流量而非过手现金流量的资产。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>3</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）该分级所承担的基础资产的信用风险，等于或小于基础资产本身的信用风险。例如，</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">分级的信用评级等于或高于假设发行单一工具（不分级），该工具所得到的信用评级。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">基础资产中除基础工具外，还可以有满足以下条件的其他工具：</SPAN><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>1</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）可以降低基础资产中基础工具现金流量波动性，并且当与基础工具相结合时，能够产生仅为对本金和以未偿付本金金额为基础的利息的支付的现金流量（例如，利率上限或下限，或</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">者降低部分或全部基础工具的信用风险的合同）。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">利息</SPAN>的</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">合同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">特</SPAN>征。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">又如，某些合同使用本金和利息描述合同现金流量，但债权人的索偿要求仅限于债务人的特定资产或产生于特定资产的现金流量，此类合同可能不符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征。然</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">而，债权人的索偿要求仅限于债务人的特定资产或基于特定资产的现金流量并不一定会导致金融</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">资产不符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征。企业需要对特定的基础资产或其现金流量进行评估（即穿透），以确定待分类的金融资产是否符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征。如果金融资产的合同条款产生了其他现金流量，或者以一种与代表本金和利息的支付不一致的方式限制了现金</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">流量，则该金融资产不符合本金加利息的合同现金流量特征。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">无论基础资产为金融资产或非金融资产，均不会影响合同现金流量评估。在某些情况下，企</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">业可能无法了解基础资产的具体情况</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>(</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">如投资的具体组成、期限、条款等），因而无法对特定的基</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">础资产或其现金流量进行评估，则企业无法确定待分类的金融资产是否符合本金加利息的合同现</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">金流量特征。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>3</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）在一般的借款合同中，通常都会规定债权人持有的金融工具相对于债务人的其他债权</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">人持有的工具的优先劣后顺序。对于劣后于其他工具的工具，如果债务人不付款构成违约，并且</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">即使在债务人破产的情况下债权人也拥有收取本金及以未偿付本金金额为基础的利息的合同权利<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">则</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">符</SPAN>合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">本</SPAN>金加<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">利</SPAN>息<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>流<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>特征<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">。</SPAN>反之<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">，</SPAN>如<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">果</SPAN>次<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">级特</SPAN>征以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">任</SPAN>何<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">方</SPAN>式<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">限</SPAN>制了</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">合同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">或</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">任</SPAN>何形<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">式</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>他<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">，</SPAN>则该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>符<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>加<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">利</SPAN>息的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流量</SPAN>特</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">征<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">。</SPAN>例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">如</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">，</SPAN>某<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">持</SPAN>有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">一</SPAN>笔被<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">列</SPAN>为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">普</SPAN>通<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">债</SPAN>权<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">收</SPAN>账<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">如</SPAN>果<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>债<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">务</SPAN>人<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">还有</SPAN>一笔<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷款</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">且</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">存在<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">抵</SPAN>押<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">物</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">从</SPAN>而<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">使</SPAN>得<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">债</SPAN>务人<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">破</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>其<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">方</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">优</SPAN>先于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">普</SPAN>通<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">债</SPAN>权<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">人</SPAN>索<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">偿</SPAN>（<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">但</SPAN>并不<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">影</SPAN>响<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">一</SPAN>般<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">债权</SPAN>人</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">收<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">取</SPAN>尚未支<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">付</SPAN>的本金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">和</SPAN>其他<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">应</SPAN>付金额<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">的</SPAN>合同权<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">利</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -5.3pt">）</SPAN>，则<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">该</SPAN>应收账<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">款</SPAN>也可能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">符</SPAN>合本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">金</SPAN>加利息<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">的</SPAN>合同</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">现金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">特</SPAN>征。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpLast 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>4</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）如果合同现金流量特征仅对金融资产的合同现金流量构成极其微小的影响，则不会影</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">响金融资产的分类。要作出此判断，企业必须考虑合同现金流量特征在每一会计期间的潜在影响</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以及在金融工具整个存续期内的累积影响。此外，如果合同现金流量特征</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>(</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">无论某一会计期间还</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">是整个存续期）对合同现金流量的影响超过了极其微小的程度，企业应当进一步判断该现金流量</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">特征是否是不现实的。如果现金流量特征仅在极端罕见、显著异常且几乎不可能的事件发生时才影响该工具的合同现金流量，那么该现金流量特征是不现实的。如果该现金流量特征不现实，则不影响金融资产的分类。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoNormal 
style="MARGIN: 0cm 0cm 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><o:p><FONT 
face=Calibri>&nbsp;</FONT></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpFirst

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（三）金融资产的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>体<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">分</SPAN>类</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>1.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">摊<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">余</SPAN>成<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">本</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金融</SPAN>资产。</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> <SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">金融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>时<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">符</SPAN>合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">下</SPAN>列<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">条</SPAN>件的<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">需要指出的是，对于上述情况，实务中企业可能难以做到将所涉及的金融资产和金融负债在</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">同一时间进行公允价值指定。如果企业能够将每项相关交易在初始确认时予以公允价值指定，且</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">预期剩下的交易将会发生，那么可以有合理的延迟。此外，公允价值选择权只能应用于一项金融工具整体，不能是某一组成部分。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>2.</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">根据正式书面文件载明的企业风险管理或投资策略，企业以公允价值为基础对金融负债组</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">合或金融资产和金融负债组合进行管理和业绩评价，并在内部以此为基础向关键管理人员报告。</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以公允价值为基础进行管理的金融资产组合，由于其按照本准则规定已经被分类为以公允价值计</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">量且其变动计入当期损益，因此，不再将公允价值选择权应用于此类金融资产。此项条件强调的</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">是企业日常管理和评价业绩的方式，而不是关注金融工具组合中各组成部分的性质。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpLast 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业将一项金融资产、一项金融负债或者一组金融工具（金融资产、金融负债或者金融资产</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">及负债）指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的，一经作出不得撤销。即使造成会计错</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">配的金融工具被终止确认，也不得撤销这一指定。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">到</SPAN>的<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">差</SPAN><SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">。</SPAN>根<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>。</SPAN><SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>定<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN><SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>不<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">效</SPAN>日<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">。</SPAN>注<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">意</SPAN>这里<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>初<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">始</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN>日<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>一<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>是承<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>③</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">因为预计存续期与违约风险之间的复杂关系，企业在对信用风险的变化进行评估时，不</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">能简单地比较违约风险随时间推移的绝对变化。例如，如果一项预计存续期为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>10</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">年的金融工具在初始确认时确定的违约概率，与后来预计存续期仅剩</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>5</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">年时确定的违约概率相同，则可能表明其信用风险已经增加。因为一般而言，在信用风险不变的情况下，金融工具的存续期越长，则违约概率越高。随着存续期的消减，违约概率一般也逐渐降低（对于仅在临近到期日才具有重大付款义务的金融工具而言，发生违约的概率不一定随时间的推移而降低）。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">实务中，企业可以用未来</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>12</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个月内发生违约风险的变化作为整个存续期内发生违约风险变</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">化的合理估计，以确定自初始确认后信用风险是否已显著增加。但是，在某些情形下可能并不适合使用未来</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>12</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个月内发生违约风险的变化来确定是否应当确认整个存续期预期信用损失。例如，合同现金流在预计存续期内不均匀分布，其在未来</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>12</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个月内没有现金流；或者未来</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>12</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个月的违约风险不能充分反映相关的宏观经济因素或其他信用因素的变化。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>④</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对于自初始确认后信用风险变化的显著性，应当在与初始确认时确定的违约概率相比较的基础上进行考虑。假如违约概率变化的绝对值一定，则初始确认时违约概率较低的金融工具与初始确认时违约概率较高的金融工具相比，其信用风险变化更为显著。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

size=3><SPAN

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">特点对构成违约的逾期天数做出定义，但是，如果一项金融工具逾期超过（含）</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>90</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">日，则企业应当推定该金融工具已发生违约，除非企业有合理且有依据的信息，表明以更长的逾期时间作为违约标准更为恰当。企业应当对所有相关金融工具一致地适用上述关于违约的规定，除非有证据表明对特定金融工具采用不同的违约标准更为恰当。</SPAN><SPAN

style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对于某些金融工具而言，企业在单项工具层面无法以合理成本获得关于信用风险显著增加的充分证据，而在组合基础上评估信用风险是否显著增加则是可行的。例如，对于零售贷款，商业</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">银行可能无法跟踪每个借款人的个人信用变化，从而无法在逾期前识别出信用风险的显著变化。然而，如果所有零售贷款的整体信用风险受当地经济社会环境的影响，银行就应当通过就业率等前瞻性经济指标在组合基础上进行信用风险变化的评估。因此，本准则第四十八条规定了以金融工具组合为基础进行评估的要求。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">为在组合基础上进行信用风险变化评估，企业可以共同风险特征为依据，将金融工具分为不</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">同组别，从而使有关评估更为合理并能及时识别信用风险的显著增加。企业不应将具有不同风险</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">特征的金融工具归为同一组别，从而形成不相关的结论。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>①</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">金融工具类型；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>②</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">信用风险评级；</SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>④</FONT></SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>⑤</FONT></SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>⑥</FONT></SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>⑦</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">借款人所处地理位置；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>⑧</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">贷款抵押率</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> <SPAN lang=EN-US>(Loan-To-Collateral</SPAN></FONT><SPAN

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>LTC)</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">。</SPAN><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">产</SPAN>成<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>一<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">项</SPAN>源生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">已</SPAN>发<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>减<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">值</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>产。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>②</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">合同修改未导致终止确认的合同现金流量变化的处理。</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">该情形下，企业应当基于以合理成本即可获得的、合理且有依据的信息，来评估该金融资产自初始确认（初始确认日不因合同的修改而变化）后信用风险是否已显著增加，而不得将该资产直接假定为具有较低的信用风险。如果企业认为该金融资产在合同修改后不再满足确认整个存续期内预期信用损失的标准，应当按照本准则第五十条处理。通常情况下，只有债务人在一段时期内一贯地表现出良好的还款行为，企业才能认为相关信用风险已经降低。例如，银行对于客户漏付某笔还款或未全额还清的历史记录，通常不能简单地因为其依照修改后的合同条款及时做出了一次还款行为而消除。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>2.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">特</SPAN><SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">情</SPAN>形。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">形</SPAN>下，</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">无</SPAN>需<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">融</SPAN>工<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">始</SPAN>确认<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>1</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">较<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>违约<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">较</SPAN>低<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">，</SPAN>借<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>人<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">在</SPAN>短期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">内</SPAN>履<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>其<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">支</SPAN>付<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">较</SPAN>长<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>期内<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">经</SPAN>济<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">形</SPAN>势<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>经<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">营</SPAN>环<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">境</SPAN>存在<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>利<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>一<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>会降<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">履行</SPAN>其支付<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">义</SPAN>务<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>能力<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">，</SPAN>那<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">么</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>被视<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被</SPAN>视<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>具有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">较</SPAN>低<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>风<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对于在资产负债表日具有较低信用风险的金融工具，企业可以不用与其初始确认时的信用风险进行比较，而直接做出该工具的信用风险自初始确认后未显著增加的假定（企业对这种简化处理有选择权）。</SPAN><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">金融工具不能仅因其担保物的价值较高而被视为具有较低的信用风险，也不能仅因为其与其他金融工具相比违约风险较低，或者相对于企业所处的地区的信用风险水平而言风险相对较低而被视为具有较低的信用风险。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><A

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>”</FONT></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bookmark: OLE_LINK1"><SPAN style="mso-bookmark: OLE_LINK2"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以上的外部信用评级，则该工具可能被视为具有较低信用风险。当然，金融工具并非一定要具有外部评级才能被视为具有较低的信用风险。但是，企业应当始终从市场参与者（参见《企业会计准则第</SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>——</FONT></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bookmark: OLE_LINK1"><SPAN style="mso-bookmark: OLE_LINK2"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">公允价值计量》对</SPAN><SPAN

style="mso-bookmark: OLE_LINK1"><SPAN style="mso-bookmark: OLE_LINK2"><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">如果某项金融工具在上一资产负债表日被视为具有较低信用风险而在当前资产负债表日不被视为具有较低信用风险，企业不能仅因为这一事实就判定其信用风险显著增加，而仍应当通过比较该工具初始确认时的信用风险和当前资产负债表日的信用风险做出判定。</SPAN><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（</SPAN><SPAN

style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>在初始确认时，乙银行考虑了该工具在初始确认时的信用风险水平，由于该贷款不符合本准则对已发生信用减值的金融资产的定义，因此判断其不属于源生的已发生信用减值的贷款。<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>自初始确认后，由于宏观经济波动，甲公司所属行业的总体销售情况和甲公司的销售情况发生了下滑，甲公司的收入和现金流量低于其经营计划和乙银行的预计。尽管甲公司已采取措施（例 
如增加对库存的清理），但其销售情况仍未达到预期水平。为保证流动性，甲公司已提用了另一项循环信贷额度，导致其杠杆率升高。因此，甲公司目前（即乙银行的资产负债表日）已处于对乙银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>边<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">缘</SPAN>。乙银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>在<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">负</SPAN>债<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">表</SPAN>日<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>甲公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">总</SPAN>体<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险评<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">估</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">全</SPAN>面<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">考</SPAN>虑<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">关</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">、</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>理<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">即</SPAN>可获<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">得</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">、</SPAN>合<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">据</SPAN>的信<SPAN

style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>【例<SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 
27</SPAN>】甲公司是乙集团的控股公司，乙集团从事生产经营所处的行业具有周期性。丙银行向甲公司发放了一笔贷款。在发放该贷款时，由于预期该行业的全球需求将进一步增长，因此丙银行认为：该行业的总体前景看好；但考虑到原料价格的波动性，以及该行业在经营周期中所处的位置，预计销量会有所下降。此外，甲公司以往一直致力于扩大经营规模，不断通过收购相关行业公司的多数股份实现外部增长。因此，乙集团结构复杂并且一直在发生变化。投资者很难对乙集团的预期绩效进行准确分析并对甲公司在控股公司层面可用的现金流量进行预测。在丙银行向甲公司发放贷款时，尽管 
甲公司的债权人普遍认为其杠杆率尚处于可接受的程度，但由于甲公司有融资即将到期，债权人仍然担心甲公司为其现有债务开展再融资的能力。此外，债权人还担心甲公司是否有能力继续使 
用其从子公司分得的股息支付当前债务的利息。<SPAN lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>在丙银行发放贷款时，基于对该贷款预期存续期内的预测，甲公司的杠杆率与其他的具有相似信用风险的银行客户的杠杆率基本一致。如果不发生违约事件，甲公司的偿债能力比率距离上 
限还有很大空间。丙银行运用其自有的内部评级方法确定对甲公司贷款的信用风险，得到该贷款的内部信用评级。该内部评级结果以历史、当前和前瞻性信息为基础，旨在反映贷款在存续期内的信用风险。在初始确认时，丙银行认为：该贷款属于高信用风险贷款，具有一定投机因素；认为甲公司受不确定因素（例如对乙集团产生现金流量的不确定性预期）的影响可能导致违约。但 
是，该贷款尚不属于购入或源生的已发生信用减值的金融资产。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

align=left><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>在丙<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">银</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>资<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">产</SPAN>负<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">，</SPAN>乙集<SPAN

</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>5<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.75pt"> 
</SPAN></SPAN>家重要子<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">初</SPAN>始<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认时<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>乙<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">银</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN>为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>不属<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">于</SPAN>本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">准</SPAN>则<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">所</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">义</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">源</SPAN>生的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">已</SPAN>发<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用减</SPAN>值的贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>自初<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">始</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认后</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">由</SPAN>于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">宏观</SPAN>经济<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">环</SPAN>境<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">趋差</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司的</SPAN>收入<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>营<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">业</SPAN>利<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">润</SPAN>下<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">降</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">此</SPAN>外<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">，</SPAN>市<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">场</SPAN>预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>监管部<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">门</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>所<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">属</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">业</SPAN>的监<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">管</SPAN>要<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">求</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>趋<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">于</SPAN>严<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">格</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.7pt">，</SPAN>因<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">而</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">一</SPAN>步<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">收</SPAN>入<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>营<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">业利</SPAN>润产生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">负</SPAN>面<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">影</SPAN>响<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">。</SPAN>上<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">述</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">化</SPAN>可能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>运<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">营</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>重大<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">且</SPAN>持<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">续</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">负</SPAN>面<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">影</SPAN>响。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>由于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">上</SPAN>述<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">近</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">最</SPAN>新<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">情</SPAN>况<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>及预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>会<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">出</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>利<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">经</SPAN>济<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">状</SPAN>况<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.7pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">乙</SPAN>银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>自由<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流量</SPAN>将下降<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">到</SPAN>按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">偿</SPAN>还<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>能非<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">常</SPAN>紧<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">张</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">程</SPAN>度<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">。</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>乙银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>估<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">如</SPAN>果<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>的现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>流<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>状<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">况进</SPAN>一步恶<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">化</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">将</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>致<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">使</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>公司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>无<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">法</SPAN>按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">规</SPAN>定按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>偿<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">还</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">即</SPAN>发<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>逾<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>。此外<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">，</SPAN>近<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">第</SPAN>三<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">方</SPAN>评<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">估</SPAN>结果<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">表</SPAN>明<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">，</SPAN>由<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">于</SPAN>房<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">地</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>值下<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">跌</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">抵</SPAN>押<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">率</SPAN>已<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">升</SPAN>至<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.6pt"> 
</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>70<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">%</SPAN></SPAN>。 
<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">本</SPAN>例中，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">在</SPAN>资产负<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">债</SPAN>表日<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">，</SPAN>乙银行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">不</SPAN>能认为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">对</SPAN>甲公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">司</SPAN>的贷款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">只</SPAN>具有较<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">低</SPAN>的信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">用</SPAN>风险。<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">因</SPAN>此，乙银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">照</SPAN>本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">准</SPAN>则<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">第</SPAN>四十<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">八</SPAN>条<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">规</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>不<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">考</SPAN>虑<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>持有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">担</SPAN>保<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">物</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">影</SPAN>响<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>评<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">估</SPAN>甲公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风险</SPAN>自 初始<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">后</SPAN>是<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">否</SPAN>显<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">著</SPAN>增<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">加</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN>乙<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">银</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">评</SPAN>估<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">发</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>流量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">此</SPAN>时<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">即</SPAN>使<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">出</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">微</SPAN>小<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">恶</SPAN>化都<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">导</SPAN>致<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲公</SPAN>司无法<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">按</SPAN>合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>规<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>还<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">因</SPAN>此<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>在<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">负债</SPAN>表日<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">高</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">所</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">，</SPAN>乙<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">银</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认为</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN>该贷款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">险</SPAN>（<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">即</SPAN>违<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">约</SPAN>的风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">）</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">自</SPAN>初<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">始</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN>后<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">已</SPAN>显著<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">增</SPAN>加<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">。</SPAN>因<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">而</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">银</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>甲公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认了 整个<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">存</SPAN>续<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>内<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>损失。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>尽管<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">乙</SPAN>银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN>了整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">个</SPAN>存<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">续</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">内</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.7pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">但</SPAN>是<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">乙</SPAN>银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05pt">对</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失的</SPAN>计 量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">应</SPAN>当反映<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">预</SPAN>期自担<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">保</SPAN>物上<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">收</SPAN>回的金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">额</SPAN>（见下<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">文</SPAN>关于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">预</SPAN>期信用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">损</SPAN>失计量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">中</SPAN>担保<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">物</SPAN>的影响<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">部</SPAN>分<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -5.3pt">）</SPAN>， 因此<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>较<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">小</SPAN>。<SPAN

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业对预期信用损失的估计，应当反映相关可观察数据的变化并与其保持方向一致（例如，</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN

face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">特定金融工具或类似金融工具信用风险的可观察的市场信息（例如针对特定主体的信用风险违约掉期的市场价格），企业应当在预期信用损失计量中予以考虑。企业还应当定期复核用于估计预</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">期信用损失的可观察数据，以减少估计值与实际信用损失之间的差异。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">在考虑前瞻性信息时，并不要求企业对金融工具整个预计存续期内的情况做出预测。企业在估计预期信用损失时需要运用的判断程度的高低，取决于具体信息的可获取性。预测的时间跨度越大，具体信息的可获取性越低，则企业在估计预期信用损失时必须运用判断的程度就越高。本准则并不要求企业对很远的未来做出详细估计，企业只需根据现有资料对未来情况进行推断。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">1. </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">应当确认整个存续期内预期信用损失的信用卡额度违约风险敞口 
<SPAN lang=EN-US>25 000 </SPAN>万元（其中，应确认整个预计存续期内的预期信用损失的未偿还余额 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>20 000 </SPAN>万元，加上预计后续<SPAN lang=EN-US> 30 
</SPAN>个月内将从信用风险自初始确认后已显著增加的未提用额度<SPAN lang=EN-US> 10 000 </SPAN>万元中实际提用 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>5 000 </SPAN>万元）。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">2. </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">应确认 <SPAN lang=EN-US>12 
</SPAN>个月内预期信用损失的信用卡额度违约风险敞口为 <SPAN lang=EN-US>45 000 </SPAN>万元（其中，应确认 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>12 </SPAN>个月内预期信用损失的未偿还余额<SPAN lang=EN-US> 60 000-20 000=40 000 
</SPAN>万元，加上信用风险自初始确认后未显著增加未提用额度 <SPAN lang=EN-US>30 000 </SPAN>万元中预计后续<SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 12 </SPAN>个月内将提用的 <SPAN lang=EN-US>5 000 </SPAN>万元）。 
甲银行通过上述过程确定了违约风险敞口和预计存续期，并以此为基础计算该信用卡组合的整个存续期内预期信用损失和<SPAN lang=EN-US> 12 
</SPAN>个月内预期信用损失。 
甲银行基于信用额度整体计量预期信用损失，因此无法单独识别未提用承诺部分的预期信用损失和贷款部分的预期信用损失。甲银行在其资产负债表中，将未提用承诺部分的预期信用损失与贷款部分的损失准备一并确认。如果合并列示的预期信用损失超出了金融资产的账面余额，对 
于超过部分，应列示为预计负债。如果甲银行基于未提用承诺和贷款分别计量预期信用损失，那么未提用承诺部分的预期信用损失应在资产负债表中列示为预计负债。</SPAN></FONT></P>

style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">在考<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">虑</SPAN>修<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">改</SPAN>后<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>流量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>基<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">础</SPAN>上<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">，</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">银</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">评</SPAN>估了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">是</SPAN>否<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">应</SPAN>继<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">续</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>按整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">个</SPAN>存<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">续期</SPAN>内 预期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">准</SPAN>备<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">并</SPAN>重<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">新</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">算</SPAN>了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">准</SPAN>备<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>将<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>前<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">险</SPAN>（<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">基</SPAN>于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">修</SPAN>改<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">后</SPAN>的现金流<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">）</SPAN>与<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">初</SPAN>始<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时的</SPAN>信用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">险</SPAN>（<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">基</SPAN>于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">初</SPAN>始<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">未修</SPAN>改的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">流量</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">）</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">进</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">比较</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN>为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">已</SPAN>显著增<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">加</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">因</SPAN>此<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">继</SPAN>续<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">按</SPAN>整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">个</SPAN>存续<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>内<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>计量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">准</SPAN>备<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">。</SPAN>在<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">负</SPAN>债表<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">日</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>按照整个<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">存</SPAN>续<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>内<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>损失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>准<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">备</SPAN>余<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">额</SPAN>为<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.65pt"> 
</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>100<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.75pt"> 
</SPAN></SPAN>万<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">元</SPAN>。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpFirst 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">注：括号内的金额代表损失。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">在后续资产负债表日，甲银行按照本准则第五十六条规定，将该贷款初始确认时的信用风险（基于初始未修改的现金流量）与资产负债表日的信用风险（基于修改后的现金流量）进行比较，以评估信用风险是否显著增加。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">修改贷款合同再过两个期间之后（第五期），与修改日的预期相比，借款人的实际业绩明显好于其经营计划。而且，借款人所属行业的前景好于此前预测。通过使用以合理成本即可获得的、 
合理且有依据的信息进行评估，甲银行发现该贷款的整体信用风险和在整个存续期内的违约风险率下降，因此甲银行在第五期期末调整了借款人的内部信用评级。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">考虑<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">到</SPAN>这<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">一</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">展</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>对该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">状</SPAN>况<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">进</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">了</SPAN>重新<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">评</SPAN>估<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>并<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>贷<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>的信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险已</SPAN>经下降<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">，</SPAN>与<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">初</SPAN>始<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>相<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">比</SPAN>已<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">无</SPAN>显<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">著</SPAN>增<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">加</SPAN>。因<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">此</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>银<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>重<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">新</SPAN>按<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt"> 
</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">1</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US>2<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt"> </SPAN></SPAN>个<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">月</SPAN>内<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信用</SPAN>损失计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">贷</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>准<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">备</SPAN>。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-add-space: auto; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体">【例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.65pt"> </SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">36</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">】</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>是一<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">家制</SPAN>造业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企业</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>经<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">营</SPAN>地<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">域单</SPAN>一且<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">固定</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">。</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">2</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>×17<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.75pt"> </SPAN></SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">年</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲公</SPAN>司应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">收</SPAN>账<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>合计为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.65pt"> </SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>3<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.75pt"> </SPAN></SPAN>亿<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">元</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">考</SPAN>虑<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">到</SPAN>客<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">户</SPAN>群由<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">众</SPAN>多<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">小</SPAN>客<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">户</SPAN>构<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">根</SPAN>据<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">代</SPAN>表<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">偿</SPAN>付<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>力<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>客户<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">共</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">特征</SPAN>对 应收<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">账</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">进</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">分</SPAN>类<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">。</SPAN>上<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">述</SPAN>应收<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">账</SPAN>款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>包<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">含</SPAN>重<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">大</SPAN>融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>成分<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">。</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>上<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">述</SPAN>应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">收</SPAN>账款<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">始</SPAN>终<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">按</SPAN>整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">个存</SPAN>续 期内<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>预<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>损失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">准</SPAN>备。甲公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>使<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>逾<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>天<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">数</SPAN>与<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">违</SPAN>约损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>率<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>照<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">表</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">应</SPAN>收账<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN>组<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.7pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>照<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">表以</SPAN>此 类应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">收</SPAN>账<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">款</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05pt">预</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>存<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">续</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>历史<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">违</SPAN>约<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">率</SPAN>为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">基</SPAN>础<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>并根<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">据</SPAN>前<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">瞻</SPAN>性<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">估</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">予</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">调</SPAN>整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">在</SPAN>每<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">个</SPAN>资<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">产负</SPAN>债 表日<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">，</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">都</SPAN>将<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">分</SPAN>析<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">前</SPAN>瞻性<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">估</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">并</SPAN>据<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">此</SPAN>对历<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">史</SPAN>违<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">约</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>率<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">进</SPAN>行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">调</SPAN>整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>测<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">下</SPAN>一年 的经<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">济</SPAN>形<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">势</SPAN>将<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">恶</SPAN>化。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>
